acceptSubmission(uint256,uint256).details: Accepts a submission for a bounty
acceptSubmission(uint256,uint256).return: True if the submission is accepted

params.description: Description of the bounty being created

createBounty(string).return: The Id of the bounty created

createSubmission(uint256,string).details: Creates a submission to a specific bounty

params.bountyId: The Id of the bounty the submission is for
params.description: Description of the submission being created

createSubmission(uint256,string).return: The Id of the submission created

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).details: The creator of a bounty can withdraw his funds
emergencyWithdraw(uint256).return: True if the funds were withdrawn

fetchBounty(uint256).details: Retrieves a bounty using a bounty Id

fetchSubmission(uint256).details: Retrieves a submission using a submission Id

getBountyCount().details: Gets the number of bounties submitted

getBountySubmissionCount(uint256).details: Gets the number of submissions for a bounty
getBountySubmissionCount(uint256).return: The total number of submissions for that bounty

getBountySubmissionIdByIndex(uint256,uin.details: Gets the Id of a submission by the index in bounties_submissions array

params.index: The index in the bounties_submissions array

getSubmissionCount().details: Gets the total number of submissions

getUserBountyIdByIndex(address,uint256).details: Gets the user's bounty Id by the user's address and index number

params.index: The index in the users_bounties array

rejectSubmission(uint256,uint256).details: Rejects a submission for a bounty
rejectSubmission(uint256,uint256).return: True if the submission is rejected

toggleContractActive().details: Makes sure only the admin can stop the contract

userNumBounties(address).details: Gets the number of bounties a user has submitted
userNumBounties(address).return: The number of bounties for the user

withdrawBountyAmount(uint256).return: True if the submitter is paid
